title: The Unyielding Spirit of Jin Perry
summary: Jin Perry, a 70-year-old superhero with a talent for consulting and public speaking, discovers his superpowers and saves his city from disaster over the span of a week.
summaryGerman: Jin Perry, ein 70-jähriger Superheld mit Talent für Beratung und öffentliches Sprechen, entdeckt seine Superkräfte und rettet seine Stadt innerhalb einer Woche vor einer Katastrophe.
summaryDutch: Jin Perry, een 70-jarige superheld met een talent voor consulting en publiek spreken, ontdekt zijn superkrachten en redt zijn stad van een ramp in de loop van een week.
summaryFrench: Jin Perry, un super-héros de 70 ans doué pour le conseil et la prise de parole en public, découvre ses superpouvoirs et sauve sa ville d'une catastrophe en l'espace d'une semaine.

story.text: Jin Perry, while consulting at a local business, accidentally discovers his ability to manipulate time after touching a mysterious artifact. Extremely startled but curious, he decides to explore his newfound power.
After practicing privately, Jin successfully reverses a minor event that could have led to a traffic accident. Heartened by his success, he feels a surge of responsibility to use his power for good.

Jin speaks at a public event, subtly using his power to alleviate people's personal regrets by letting them 'redo' moments from their day. His indirect approach keeps his ability a secret while still helping the community.
Word of 'miracles' around town begin to spread. Jin keeps a low profile, focusing on mastering his skills. He struggles with the ethical implications of his actions but remains committed.
A crisis emerges when a local dam begins to crack. Jin uses his time manipulation to coordinate a perfect rescue operation, preventing a catastrophic flood.
After the rescue, the community gathers to thank the mysterious hero. Jin, hidden among them, feels a bond with his townfolk like never before.
Reflecting on the week, Jin decides to use his powers quietly to aid his community, believing in the importance of small, unseen acts of heroism.

ending: Jin Perry continued to be a silent guardian, a hidden protector, proving that heroes come in all ages and forms.
moral: True heroism comes not from the acclaim it receives, but from the lives it quietly saves.
